official_title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate Pennsylvania State route 60 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate Pennsylvania State route 60 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.
